title: Project crafting
body: I recently got the project pucian blueprint but i mess with ip and couldnt afford to buy one more project core in order to have 11 and get the shard..that is unfair because when i managed to get the ip with lots of games played chests were gone..i would appreciate if you could sell me another one project core bcz i want this skin so much :( and now with capital controls in greece my paysafe account which had a lot of money is unusuable..so i cannot buy it..only with prepaid cards which are sold only the 20 $ ones.So that i ask is another one day to buy one project chest..i beg u rito pls :')i dont wanna spend the cores on icons jeez :/

replies.body: Unfortunately, project disruption event is now over and materials are no longer available to obtain.  I know that's not really good news to hear, but it was a long event to allow everyone a chance to unlock content that they wanted.  If you have anything left over, you may be able to disenchant them soon for other materials, and unlock other content like shards that you might have.  Let me know if you have any questions!
